about_the_game: The Men of War II Digital Artbook showcases many of the iconic World War II vehicles you are able to command in the game, from all three playable nations – Soviets, Americans and Germans – and provides insight into both their historical and in-game significance; but not only that, the Artbook also features a compilation of designs, concept art and artworks created throughout the development of the game, and gives its readers the opportunity to sneak a peek into the artistic process that led to the creation of Men of War II.
detailed_description: The Men of War II Digital Artbook showcases many of the iconic World War II vehicles you are able to command in the game, from all three playable nations – Soviets, Americans and Germans – and provides insight into both their historical and in-game significance; but not only that, the Artbook also features a compilation of designs, concept art and artworks created throughout the development of the game, and gives its readers the opportunity to sneak a peek into the artistic process that led to the creation of Men of War II.
